name: TraceLine.Builder
description: The TraceLine.Builder class provides a fluent interface for creating TraceLine instances with method chaining. It's the recommended way to create trace lines that draw from screen positions to world positions with complex configurations.
overview:
The TraceLine.Builder class allows you to construct TraceLine objects through a chain of method calls, making the configuration process more readable and maintainable. Instead of passing multiple parameters to constructors, you can set properties individually using descriptive method names.

The builder is typically obtained through the Draw3D.traceLine() method and provides two final operations:
- build() - Creates the TraceLine instance
- buildAndAdd() - Creates the TraceLine instance and automatically adds it to the Draw3D context

methods.name: pos
methods.signature: pos(double x, double y, double z)
methods.description: Sets the world position where the trace line should end.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the target world position

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the target world position

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the target world position

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Sets the world position using a Pos3D object.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The target world position as a Pos3D object

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Sets the world position using a BlockPosHelper object.

methods.name: x
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate of the target world position.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the target world position

methods.name: y
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate of the target world position.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the target world position

methods.name: z
methods.description: Sets only the Z coordinate of the target world position.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the target world position

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the trace line color using RGB format with full alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the trace line color using RGB format with custom alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.signature: color(int r, int g, int b)
methods.description: Sets the trace line color using separate RGB values with full alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.signature: color(int r, int g, int b, int a)
methods.description: Sets the trace line color using separate RGBA values.

methods.name: alpha
methods.description: Sets only the alpha transparency value while preserving RGB color.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Creates the configured TraceLine instance without adding it to the Draw3D context.

methods.name: buildAndAdd
methods.description: Creates the configured TraceLine instance and automatically adds it to the Draw3D context.
examples:
const traceLine = draw3D.traceLine()
    .pos(100, 64, 200)
    .color(0x00FF00)
    .buildAndAdd(); // Automatically added to Draw3D context
